REASON: Drowsiness- Its advisable that this medication not be taken if you do not intend to rest the next day. Use care when operating a motor vehicle and/or electronic devices that require mental alertness.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR CYCLOBENZAPRINE: Please be advised that this medication is muscle relaxant, NOT an analgesic, therefore it does not effectively provide pain relief. I use this medication to treat muscle spasms/cramps and stiffness. My usual dose is 10-20 mg qhs PRN.

Normally this medicine isn't used on a long term basis but my doctor made an exception because it helps fight the fibromyalgia muscle spasms so that I can get a good night's sleep. Because I've been on it so long, I no longer feel tired from it during the day. It has not lost its effectiveness nor have I needed a dosage increase.

CYCLOBENZAPRINE+HCL: This drug can easily become addicting so use in moderation is advisable.

REASON: this medication would knock me out for the night. in the morning i would feel very tired and hangover like.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR CYCLOBENZAPRINE: it does work for pain but it makes me really tired throughout the day. i took it only as neccessary.

REASON: other than very sleepy after about 4 hours from taking it,it works good. you get a good night sleep and i have also found that when i take it like prescribed (3 times a day)i feel calm,relaxed and so peaceful,and for me this is GOOD because i suffer from ptsd due to childhood issues so the depression and anxiety are a battle,and this helps me with pain and my nerves.
Extreme drowsiness, even the next day.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR CYCLOBENZAPRINE: Good for muscle spasms if you can lay in bed for a few days with the drowsiness.

REASON: After 9 pills, urination became increasingly difficult until finally I could not urinate at all. requiring a $500 trip to the hospital to insert a catheter that I had to wear for a week.

SIDE EFFECTS FOR CYCLOBENZAPRINE: My Spine on the pain scale from 1 to 10 & 10 being the worst possible pain, my average day is right around an eight and with this drug my pain only drops to around a six.

RATING: Tension Headache at base of skull
REASON: Drugged feeling in the morning...but tolerable.  Able to go to work.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR CYCLOBENZAPRINE: Nothing would release my tension headache..which I've had 24hrs per day for 12 weeks.  This did start to release it.  I take 10mg per night and 5mg in the day.  I am also on Paxil and probably the two together make me feel more drugged than other people would.  But it's worth it to get some relief.

REASON: Maybe a little blurred vision the first night of taking them, but could have been the other medication.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR CYCLOBENZAPRINE: Really helped, didn't relax all the muscles. It did to were it didn't hurt so much.

CYCLOBENZAPRINE+HCL: aided in relaxing muscles in neck and shoulder area
No bad side effects at all
RATING: Length of time taking drug, 5 years
